issue.title: item.rakuten.co.jp

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://item.rakuten.co.jp/asus-store/a940w8h/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fitem.rakuten.co.jp%2Fasus-store%2Fa940w8h%2F) ### Comment > When I search or view products on rakuten,the site doesn't respond or often crashes and takes longer to display products. > > I tried to find out how to reproduce crashing website and noticed that it might be easier to reproduce by using Private Browsing(safari) in my end. > > I reported this issue to support adguard and got advice that try to reinstall adguard. After doing that this issue occurred again so I recorded videos that shows this issue. Please check the videos if you feel like it. > I don't know how to share videos when I report issues,so I uploaded them to google drive. > Video1 shows when adguard disabled and Video2 shows adguard enabled. I did the same operation in scrolling as possible. > > Video1 url:https://drive.google.com/file/d/1SZGyIWTBP8F3f-cCFUHxLHWuhygHCGTi/view?usp=drivesdk > > Video2 url: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1kkjTneV3Y5dA9L117GTCagsYzwz9iQFv/view?usp=drivesdk > ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/hnnynwq981s0sosoc0gk8004cw0gsswhtxwb3oq1vk.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/82twtsn80hgcs00g88c084o84skw000pcci2doqwuo.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for iOS v4.5.10 System version: | ios18.5 License type: | paid Advanced protection: | enabled DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads

Annoyances:
AdGuard Popups,
EasyList Cookie List

Language-specific:
AdGuard Japanese

comment.body:
I turned on all 45 filters on default subscription list on adguard for ios except for adguard's language filters. 
The site got  slows down and occured webpage reloading but crashing didn't occur. 
The trend is the same that the website performed as usual  when advanced protection rotection is turned off.

issue.title: ohmywishes.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://ohmywishes.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fohmywishes.com%2F) ### Comment > Рекламный баннер сбоку на каждой странице Username: `@aturtsev` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/1vxefk13p44gg8sogcgo0kg8sw000gk2863f4xkad1.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- Platform: | uBlock Origin development build v1.63.3rc2 System version: | macOS Sequoia 15.4.1 Browser: | Яндекс Браузер Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base,
EasyList

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection,
EasyPrivacy

Social widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

Annoyances:
AdGuard Cookie Notices,
AdGuard Popups

Language-specific:
AdGuard Russian Other extensions used: | Violentmonkey

comment.body:
Текущие фильтры не полностью решают проблему с баннерами на главной странице. Блокировка затрагивает только изображения в рекламном блоке, но сам контейнер остаётся видимым, что приводит к отображению пустого пространства и остатков блока. Проблема не требует авторизации ### Фильтры, применённые в данный момент ``` podarkus.ru##+js(json-prune, data.Banners_Types) ||static.ohmywishes.com/images/banner-image/ ohmywishes.com##a[style*='url("https://static.ohmywishes.com/images/banner-image/'] ohmywishes.com##+js(json-prune, item.banners) ```
Скриншот
### Мой временное решение встроенными средствами uBlock Origin ``` ohmywishes.com##.dWXsbt.sc-jnOGJG ```
Скриншот

comment.body:
Текущие фильтры не полностью решают проблему с баннерами на главной странице. Блокировка затрагивает только изображения в рекламном блоке, но сам контейнер остаётся видимым, что приводит к отображению пустого пространства и остатков блока. Проблема не требует авторизации
Скриншот
### Фильтры, применённые в данный момент ``` podarkus.ru##+js(json-prune, data.Banners_Types) ||static.ohmywishes.com/images/banner-image/ ohmywishes.com##a[style*='url("https://static.ohmywishes.com/images/banner-image/'] ohmywishes.com##+js(json-prune, item.banners) ``` ### Мой временное решение встроенными средствами uBlock Origin ``` ohmywishes.com##.dWXsbt.sc-jnOGJG ```
